description: Retrospective application for the temporary change of use from residential (C3 use class) to classroom (D1 use class) of part 4 and to office (B1 use class) Flat 21
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted is for Hyde Housing Association only and shall cease five years from the date of the permission or such time as the final demolition phase as approved in outline planning permission P062806 granted 30 April 2007 is completed. 

REASON: The development hereby permitted is consistent with policy H2 subject to the demolition of the estate owing to the current condition of the surrounding buildings and planned decanting and demolition of the estate. Should the demolition of the estate not be undertaken, the use would be contrary to the above policy of Islington's Unitary Development Plan (2002) and the Council is only prepared to permit the use for a limited period in view of these special circumstances of this case.
